NoteInfo: パッケージに表示される追加のテキスト情報
BlackListName: 名前でブラックリスト
BlackListId: Steam IDでブラックリスト
GlobalTagsInfo: 全てのプレイヤーにアプリ上で表示されるタグ
NotReviewed: レビューがありません
NotEnoughInformation: 情報が不足しています
SubscribeToPackages: リンク先のパッケージをサブスク
RequiresConfiguration: 特定・固有の設定が必要
Switch: リンク先のパッケージに切り替え
SavesCantLoadWithoutIt: セーブデータのロードが不可能
SourceCodeNotAvailable: ソースコードが未確認・存在しません
MusicCanBeCopyrighted: 収録された音楽は、著作権で保護されている場合があります
IncompleteDescription: 説明が無い・不完全です
ManageSinglePackage: 単一パッケージを管理
ConfirmEndSession: セッションを終了してもよろしいのですか？
CrDataLoadFailed: データのロードに失敗しました、後でやり直して下さい
AddGlobalTag: グローバルタグを追加
ReuseData: 以前のデータを再利用
ReuseData_Tip:
前回、保存したパッケージの互換性データをこのまま再利用します。
Shiftキーを押しながら適用して下さい。
PleaseReviewTheStability: 保存する前に、パッケージの安定性を確認して下さい。
PleaseReviewPackageStatuses:
保存する前に、パッケージのステータスを確認して下さい。
一部で無効なステータスのタイプがあります。
PleaseReviewPackageInteractions:
保存する前に、パッケージの依存関係を確認して下さい。
一部で無効な依存関係のタイプがあります。
PleaseReviewPackageUsage: パッケージの有効な用途を選択して下さい。

Interaction_Alternative.One: '{1}' can be used as an alternative to '{0}'.
Interaction_Alternative.Plural: One of the following packages can be used as an alternative to '{0}'.

Interaction_SameFunctionality.Plural: '{0}' and the following packages have the same functionalities.

Interaction_IncompatibleWith.One: '{0}' and '{1}' are not compatible with each other.
Interaction_IncompatibleWith.Plural: '{0}' is not compatible with any of the following packages.

Interaction_CausesIssuesWith.One: '{0}' can cause issues when used with '{1}'.
Interaction_CausesIssuesWith.Plural: '{0}' can cause issues when used with the following mods.

Interaction_RequiredPackages.One: You're missing a required package for '{0}'.
Interaction_RequiredPackages.Plural: You're missing the following required packages for '{0}'.

Interaction_SucceededBy.Plural: '{0}' is succeeded by either one of the following packages.

Status_Deprecated: '{0}' is deprecated, it is no longer supported by its author.

Status_Reupload.Zero: '{0}' is a re-upload of an original package.

Status_SavesCantLoadWithoutIt.Zero: When creating a new save with '{0}' enabled, you will no longer be able to load that save if '{0}' is disabled.
Status_SavesCantLoadWithoutIt.One:
When creating a new save with '{0}' enabled, you will no longer be able to load that save if '{0}' is disabled.

Use '{1}' to recover your save if needed. Read its Workshop description for more info.

Status_TestVersion.Zero: This is a 'Test' version of the original mod. Be aware that updates to it might cause unexpected issues.
Status_TestVersion.One:
This is a 'Test' version of '{1}'.
Be aware that updates to it might cause unexpected issues.

Status_MissingDlc.One: You're missing the '{0}' DLC to use this package.
Status_MissingDlc.Plural: You're missing the following DLCs to use this package.

Status_DependencyMod: This is a dependency mod, but it does not seem like you are using any package that requires it.
Status_SourceCodeNotAvailable: The source code of this mod is not available. You should not use it unless you trust its author.
Status_MusicCanBeCopyrighted: The music inside this pack might be copyrighted. It's best not to use it while streaming.
Status_IncompleteDescription: The workshop description of this mod is too small. You should not use it unless you trust its author.
Stability_NotReviewed: This package has not been reviewed yet. The compatibility info may not be accurate.
Stability_NotEnoughInformation: There is not enough information to properly review this package.

Action_SubscribeToPackages.One: You should subscribe to the following package.
Action_SubscribeToPackages.Plural: You should subscribe to these packages.

Action_RequiresConfiguration: You should follow the following instructions.

Action_SelectOne.One: Between '{0}' and '{1}', you should choose only one of them.
Action_SelectOne.Plural: Between '{0}' and the following packages, you should only choose one.

Action_UnsubscribeOther.Plural: You should unsubscribe from the following packages.

Action_Switch.Plural: You should switch to one of the following packages.
